title: Group Therapy: Grandparents Visiting Every Weekend
description: A listener has an issue with the grandparents of her child.  There are 3 sets of grandparents and they all want to come visit every month, the problem is that they all live far enough away that they stay the entire weekend and now she feels like she doesn't get time alone with her child and husband.  What should she do about it?
